descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to inform people about the danger of igniting flammable liquids by static electricity and provide guidance on how to control static electricity when filling containers with flammable liquid at service stations.

title: Guarding on a mast climbing work platform.
descrip: This safety alert is to advise installers, owners and operators of mast climbing work platforms (MCWP) of the risks associated with erecting and dismantling MCWPs and how to best manage such risks through effective control measures.

title: Elevating work platform overturned due to damaged wiring
descrip: A SNORKEL mobile Elevating Work Platform (EWP) utilises hydraulic legs on each corner for stability.

title: Awning collapse
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the risks associated with any awning that may collapse, and to raise awareness of the requirements for installing and maintaining awnings.

title: Haulotte elevating work platform failure
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight risks associated with a failed cast steel linkage on an elevating work platform (EWP).

title: Risks associated with lifting formwork
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the risks associated with lifting formwork and the need to make sure the lifting method is safe.

title: Capstan winches
descrip: This safety alert highlights the hazards involved when operating unguarded capstan winches on board commercial fishing vessels.

title: Mobile cranes with a free fall feature
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the importance of correctly locking out the free fall controls on mobile cranes fitted with this feature.

title: Working around mobile plant during construction of roadworks and related infrastructure
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to highlight the hazards and risks to workers performing traffic management and road construction work on roadways, following two recent fatalities.

title: Obligations for guardrail systems
descrip: Stability requirements for telescopic handlers used as cranes

title: Safe operation of container sidelifters
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to inform all businesses and people who operate container sidelifters of the risk of injury when using this equipment to transfer a container from one vehicle to another.

title: Delivery and unloading of pre-cast panels
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to highlight the importance of safe delivery and unloading of pre-cast panels.

title: Insulation - installing ceiling insulation and your health and safety
descrip: Effective 1 November 2009, all Queensland insulation installers, whether or not operating under the Australian Government's Home Insulation Scheme, will be required to take additional electrical safety measures as provided in the Electrical Safety (Installation of Ceiling Insulation) Notice 2009, to protect themselves and Queensland householders. Non-compliance is a breach of electrical safety obligations - significant penalties apply.

title: Tractor roll over protective structure limitations
descrip: To alert plant owners/operators, including workers, employers, self employed persons and suppliers, of the circumstances that led to a tractor driver sustaining fatal injuries when the roll-over protective structure (ROPS) attached to the tractor failed during a roll-over incident on a sealed road.

title: Heavy vehicles and trailers hitting or crushing workers
descrip: To highlight the risks associated with workers being crushed or hit by heavy vehicles or trailers.

title: Plate clamps and dropping loads
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the risks associated with plate clamps used to lift loads, and to provide guidance on ways to use plate clamps safely.

title: Safety of amusement rides
descrip: This safety alert aims to highlight the potential risks associated with operating an amusement ride.

title: Gas Struts
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the potential risks associated with the use of gas struts.

title: Air-conditioner installation
descrip: Safety alert to inform workers installing air-conditioning units about the risk of working on pressurised plant and to provide guidance on ways to control the risks of working on pressurised plant and ensure a safe system of work is followed.

title: Trapdoors and penetration covers in construction
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to inform people of the need to correctly design trapdoors and penetration covers and to implement safe systems of work to minimise the risk of falls.

title: Inflatable water balls
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to inform owners and operators of inflatable water balls of the possible risks with their use. This alert also provides some information on risk control measures.

title: Pacific Roll Pac 16 tonne multi-tyred roller
descrip: Workplace health and safety alert regarding moving plant (equipment or machinery), specifically multi-tyred rollers

title: Hose whip on concrete pumps
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to highlight the hazards and risks to workers caused by hose whip on concrete pumps. 'Hose whip' describes the uncontrolled and rapid motion of the flexible rubber hose on the end of a concrete placement boom or other concrete delivery line. The following information is provided to assist employers, self-employed people, principal contractors, clients and project managers to meet their obligations under the Workplace Health and Safety Act 1995.

title: Lifting inserts for tilt-up and pre-cast concrete construction
descrip: Lifting inserts are specially designed and manufactured items, of controlled strength and ductility, which are cast into concrete elements for the purpose of lifting.

title: Safe loading of elevated work platforms on tilt tray trucks
descrip: The purpose of this alert is to inform people of the risk of injury when loading and unloading elevating work platforms (EWPs) onto and off tilt tray trucks.

title: Concrete pumping pipeline risks
descrip: The purpose of this safety alert is to highlight the issue of pipeline failure on concrete pumps, and to provide guidance on ways to minimise this risk.

title: Entry to confined spaces on marine craft
descrip: To alert owners and operators of marine craft to the dangers of entering previously sealed confined space environments prior to verifying that the atmosphere is safe for human occupation

title: Domestic construction - controlling falling risks while working on roof framing
descrip: Workplace health and safety alerts for uwatec analogue submersible pressure gauges part number A1-111 and A1-115
